'''Hydro Mimic Mallards''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble [[Wildlife#Ducks|Ducks]]. They take more damage from {{Cryo}} (except in certain events; see [[#Event|below]]).
